description:
TV Anime IdolM@ster: Cinderella Girls G4U! Pack Vol. 8 is an adventure game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
TV Anime IdolM@ster: Cinderella Girls G4U! Pack Vol. 8 is available on PlayStation 3.
